description.narrative: The PDO is (i) to reduce the amount of energy used and to improve the irrigation conveyance efficiency in targeted irrigation schemes; and (ii) to improve the availability and reliability of important sector data and information for decision makers and other stakeholders.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Apply and not amend or change EMF, EMPs, EIA, RPF and RAPs. | Description :The Borrower, through SCWM, shall:(a) apply for the activities under Part A of the Project the criteria, policies, procedures and arrangements set out in the EMF,EMPs, EIAs, RPF and RAPs as required; and (b) not amend or waive, or permit to be amended or waivedthe EMF, EMPs, EIA, RPF andRAPs, or any provision thereof, in a manner which, in the opinion of the Bank, may materially and adversel | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Designation of and ensuring the PIU as an effective implementation agency | Description :The Borrower, throughSCWM, shall designate the PIU with the responsibility for procurement planning, monitoring and reporting, financial management anddisbursement, maintenance of Project accounts and preparation of Project Reports, and shall ensure that PIU at all times shall haveadequate staff and resources to fulfill its responsibilities with respect to Project implementation and management. | Frequency:Yearly

Finance Agreement :Ensure necessary budgetary resources for maintenance of the irrigation systems. | Description :The Borrowershall ensure that necessary budgetary resources are made available to the irrigation sector for maintenance of irrigation systemsin the Borrower's annual budget. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Implementation of the project in accordance with the Operations manual | Description :The Borrower shall ensurethat the PIU shall carry out the Project in accordance with the Operations Manual and, except as the Bankshall otherwise agree,shall not amend or waive any provision of the Operations Manual if, in the opinion of the Bank, such amendment or waiver maymaterially and adversely affect the carrying out of the Project or the achievement of the objective thereof. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Keeping a Dam Safety Panel. | Description :The Borrower, through SCWM, shall not later than October 15, 2013create and thereafter maintain at all times, throughout Project implementation, a Dam Safety Panel comprising environmental andsocial experts, under terms of reference, composition and resources satisfactory to the Bank to advise the Borrower on safety andother critical aspects of the design, construction and operation of dams. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Keeping the WUAs' Support Group until completion of the project. | Description :The Borrower shall maintain theWUA's Support Group within the PIU until completion of the Project which shall assist in the implementation of Part C.2 of theProject. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Rehabilitation works cannot start on before an EMP is in place and disclosed. | Description :The Borrower,through SCWM, shall: (a) ensure that: (i) civil works on any particular irrigation scheme or section of a scheme selected underPart A of the Project will not start, unless an EMP for that scheme or a selected section, satisfactory to the Bank, has beenprepared by the Borrower and disclosed locally, and on the SCWM website; | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A. 1. | Description :The Borrower, through SCWE, shall designate the PIU with theresponsibility for procurement planning, monitoring and reporting, financial management and disbursement, maintenance of Projectaccounts and preparation of Project reports, and shall ensure that PIU at all times shall have adequate staff and resources tofulfill its responsibilities with respect to Project implementation and management. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A. 2. | Description :The Borrower shall ensure that the PIU shall carry out the Projectin accordance with the Operations Manual and, except as the Bank shall otherwise agree, shall not amend or waive any provision ofthe Operations Manual if, in the opinion of the Bank, such amendment or waiver may materially and adversely affect the carrying outof the Project or the achievement of the objective thereof. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A. 3. | Description: The Borrower shall maintain the WUA's Support Group within the PIUuntil completion of the Project which shall assist in the implementation of Part C.2 of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, A. 4. | Description :The Borrower shall ensure that necessary budgetary resources aremade available to the irrigation sector for maintenance of irrigation systems in the Borrowerâ€™s annual budget. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B. 1. | Description :The Borrower, through SCWE, shall: (a) apply for the activitiesunder Part A of the Project the criteria, policies, procedures and arrangements set out in the Pest Management Plan, EMF, EMPs,EIAs, RPF and RAPs as required; and (b) not amend or waive, or permit to be amended or waived the EMF, EMPs, EIA, RPF and RAPs, orany provision thereof, in a manner which, may materially and adversely affect the implementation. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B. 2. (a) (i) | Description :The Borrower, through SCWE, shall ensure that civil works onany particular irrigation scheme or section of a scheme selected under Part A of the Project will not start, unless an EMP for thatscheme or a selected section, satisfactory to the Bank, has been prepared by the Borrower and disclosed locally, and on the SCWEwebsite. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B. 2. (a) (ii) and (iii) | Description :The Borrower, through SCWE, shall ensure that thearrangements are made for public review and comment of said EMP, any comments received have been responded to in a manneracceptable to the Bank, and the final approved version of the EMP has been disclosed locally; and any provision of the respectiveEMP is not assigned, amended, abrogated or waived without prior review and approval of the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, B. 4. (b) | Description :The Borrower, through SCWE, shall continue to maintain at alltimes, throughout Project implementation, a Dam Safety Panel comprising environmental and social experts, under terms of reference,composition and resources satisfactory to the Bank, for the purpose of reviewing and advising the Borrower on safety and othercritical aspects of the design, construction and operations of dams. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Update Gegardalich dam safety plan. | Description :The Borrower, through SCWM, shall not later than March 15,2015, update and thereafter implement the Dam Safety Plan in a manner satisfactory to the Bank. The Borrower shall not amend,revise or waive the Dam Safety Plan without the prior written consent of the Bank. | Due Date :15-Mar-2015
